__e: He wants you to walk us to school.
May I walk to the station with you?
He said that he'd like you to accompany him down to the station, too, mistress
- She's afraid it'll follow me back home.
You want me to walk you back so I can tell your mother?
- Sure you don't want me to walk you home?
Take this gun. Escort this gentleman from the castle.
And take this. This will keep you updated with the score.
You didn't expect him to carry them all the way to the farm, did you?
I need you to follow me on the count of three...
Come see her one last time.
I may see you tomorrow if you accompany your wife.
Take the girls outside for a moment.
Listen, escort these lovely ladies to the car, please.
